common.initialMessage: How can I help you today?
common.whatIsYourNameMessage: What is your first and last name?
whatIsYourPhoneNumberMessages: What is your cell phone number?
common.whatIsYourEmailMessage: What is your email address? We will use this to identify your request in our system.
common.welcomeBackMessage: Welcome back! What can we help you with today,

scheduleTourFlow.whoIsInterestedMessage: We would love to have you visit our community. Could you please tell me who is interested in moving to ACME Senior Living?
scheduleTourFlow.whenMessage: When would you like to schedule your tour?

userTypeMessages.Myself: What is your timeline for potentially making a move?
userTypeMessages.Others: Please tell us if you would like to learn about any of the following activities, so we can better prepare for your tour.

finalMessages: Thank you for experiencing how FURTHER could work for you. Are you interested in learning more about FURTHER?
Your tour has been requested. Someone will be in touch shortly to confirm whether your requested date/time is available.

pricingFlow.whatLevelOfCareMessage: What level of care are you interested in?
